com.autopia4j.framework.reporting

Interface ReportType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExcelReport, HtmlReport

    public interface ReportType
    Interface representing a type of report available with the framework
    Author:
    Cognizant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResultSummaryFooter(String totalExecutionTime, int nTestsPassed, int nTestsFailed)
      Function to create a footer to close the results summary
      void addResultSummaryHeading(String heading)
      Function to add a heading to the results summary
      void addResultSummarySubHeading(String subHeading1, String subHeading2, String subHeading3, String subHeading4)
      Function to add sub-headings to the results summary (4 sub-headings present per results summary row)
      void addResultSummaryTableHeadings()
      Function to add the overall table headings to the results summary (should be called first before adding the actual content into the results summary; headings and sub-headings should be added before this)
      void addTestLogFooter(String executionTime, int nStepsPassed, int nStepsFailed)
      Function to create a footer to close the test log
      void addTestLogHeading(String heading)
      Function to add a heading to the test log
      void addTestLogSection(String section)
      Function to add a section to the test log
      void addTestLogSubHeading(String subHeading1, String subHeading2, String subHeading3, String subHeading4)
      Function to add sub-headings to the test log (4 sub-headings present per test log row)
      void addTestLogSubSection(String subSection)
      Function to add a sub-section to the test log (should be called only within a previously created section)
      void addTestLogTableHeadings()
      Function to add the overall table headings to the test log (should be called first before adding the actual content into the test log; headings and sub-headings should be added before this)
      void initializeResultSummary()
      Function to initialize the results summary
      void initializeTestLog()
      Function to initialize the test log
      void updateResultSummary(TestParameters testParameters, String testReportName, String executionTime, String testStatus)
      Function to update the results summary with the status of the test instance which was executed
      void updateTestLog(String stepNumber, String stepName, String stepDescription, Status stepStatus, Boolean shouldTakeScreenshot, String screenshotName)
      Function to update the test log with the details of a particular test step

    • Method Detail

      • initializeTestLog

        void initializeTestLog()
        Function to initialize the test log

      • addTestLogHeading

        void addTestLogHeading(String heading)
        Function to add a heading to the test log
        Parameters:
        heading - The heading to be added

      • addTestLogSubHeading

        void addTestLogSubHeading(String subHeading1,
                          String subHeading2,
                          String subHeading3,
                          String subHeading4)
        Function to add sub-headings to the test log (4 sub-headings present per test log row)
        Parameters:
        subHeading1 - The first sub-heading to be added
        subHeading2 - The second sub-heading to be added
        subHeading3 - The third sub-heading to be added
        subHeading4 - The fourth sub-heading to be added

      • addTestLogTableHeadings

        void addTestLogTableHeadings()
        Function to add the overall table headings to the test log (should be called first before adding the actual content into the test log; headings and sub-headings should be added before this)

      • addTestLogSection

        void addTestLogSection(String section)
        Function to add a section to the test log
        Parameters:
        section - The section to be added

      • addTestLogSubSection

        void addTestLogSubSection(String subSection)
        Function to add a sub-section to the test log (should be called only within a previously created section)
        Parameters:
        subSection - The sub-section to be added

      • updateTestLog

        void updateTestLog(String stepNumber,
                   String stepName,
                   String stepDescription,
                   Status stepStatus,
                   Boolean shouldTakeScreenshot,
                   String screenshotName)
        Function to update the test log with the details of a particular test step
        Parameters:
        stepNumber - The current step number
        stepName - The test step name
        stepDescription - The description of what the test step does
        stepStatus - The Status of the test step
        shouldTakeScreenshot - Boolean variable indicating whether a screenshot was taken at the current step
        screenshotName - The filename of the screenshot file (in case of failed step)

      • addTestLogFooter

        void addTestLogFooter(String executionTime,
                      int nStepsPassed,
                      int nStepsFailed)
        Function to create a footer to close the test log
        Parameters:
        executionTime - The time taken to execute the test case
        nStepsPassed - The number of test steps that passed
        nStepsFailed - The number of test steps that failed

      • initializeResultSummary

        void initializeResultSummary()
        Function to initialize the results summary

      • addResultSummaryHeading

        void addResultSummaryHeading(String heading)
        Function to add a heading to the results summary
        Parameters:
        heading - The heading to be added

      • addResultSummarySubHeading

        void addResultSummarySubHeading(String subHeading1,
                                String subHeading2,
                                String subHeading3,
                                String subHeading4)
        Function to add sub-headings to the results summary (4 sub-headings present per results summary row)
        Parameters:
        subHeading1 - The first sub-heading to be added
        subHeading2 - The second sub-heading to be added
        subHeading3 - The third sub-heading to be added
        subHeading4 - The fourth sub-heading to be added

      • addResultSummaryTableHeadings

        void addResultSummaryTableHeadings()
        Function to add the overall table headings to the results summary (should be called first before adding the actual content into the results summary; headings and sub-headings should be added before this)

      • updateResultSummary

        void updateResultSummary(TestParameters testParameters,
                         String testReportName,
                         String executionTime,
                         String testStatus)
        Function to update the results summary with the status of the test instance which was executed
        Parameters:
        testParameters - The TestParameters object containing the details of the test instance which was executed
        testReportName - The name of the test report file corresponding to the test instance
        executionTime - The time taken to execute the test instance
        testStatus - The execution status of the test instance

      • addResultSummaryFooter

        void addResultSummaryFooter(String totalExecutionTime,
                            int nTestsPassed,
                            int nTestsFailed)
        Function to create a footer to close the results summary
        Parameters:
        totalExecutionTime - The total time taken to execute all the test cases
        nTestsPassed - The number of test cases that passed
        nTestsFailed - The number of test cases that failed
